subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Share your stories for the press...?
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
This was in the former Manteno State Mental Hospital in Illinois.  A few 
of them gave names.  Someone who had access to the records looked up the 
names later on and they were the names of former patients who died there. 
The records gave the date and cause of death. They were NOT common names 
like "John Smith".

How would anyone on an EVP know the names of people long forgotten for 
over 60 years? None of us present did. It is all so fascinating ...

Zack
